title: Rangz of Power
author: VD
content_html:
In fairness, we have to give Amazon Studios some credit. Without their commitment to diversity, inclusion, and destroying the legacy of JRR Tolkien, Booster Patrol would never have been inspired to record RANGZ OF POWER. Because power is a dangerous thing.

DISCUSS ON SG
